statements: SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments;
SELECT bill_name, bill_amount FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_name, payment_method FROM automatic_bill_payments ORDER BY payment_method DESC;
SELECT AVG(bill_amount) AS average_bill_amount FROM automatic_bill_payments;
SELECT bill_name, bill_amount, payment_date FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT bill_name, bill_amount, payment_method FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_method IN ('Credit Card', 'Bank Transfer') ORDER BY payment_method DESC, bill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE reminder_date IS NULL AND payment_method = 'Cash' ORDER BY bill_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments;
SELECT user_id, bill_name, payment_date FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE bill_amount > 100;
SELECT bill_name, payment_date FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, bill_name, reminder_date FROM payment_reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments ORDER BY bill_name DESC, bill_amount ASC
SELECT user_id, bill_name, SUM(bill_amount) AS total_amount FROM automatic_bill_payments GROUP BY user_id, bill_name
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, bill_name, payment_date FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT user_id, bill_name, reminder_date FROM automatic_bill_payments LEFT JOIN payment_reminders ON automatic_bill_payments.user_id = payment_reminders.user_id AND automatic_bill_payments.bill_name = payment_reminders.bill_name

SELECT user_id, bill_name, COUNT(reminder_id) AS reminder_count FROM automatic_bill_payments LEFT JOIN payment_reminders ON automatic_bill_payments.user_id = payment_reminders.user_id AND automatic_bill_payments.bill_name = payment_reminders.bill_name GROUP BY user_id, bill_name ORDER BY reminder_count DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT bill_name, amount, due_date FROM bills WHERE reminder_sent = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_bills FROM bills GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email='example@email.com';
SELECT bill_name, amount, due_date FROM bills WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_method='Credit Card' AND amount_paid < 500;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN bills ON users.user_id = bills.user_id WHERE users.username='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM automatic_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM automatic_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bill_reminders WHERE bill_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM automatic_payments
SELECT account_name, amount FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'savings'
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM automatic_payments WHERE account_id = 1
SELECT reminder_id, bill_date, amount FROM bill_reminders ORDER BY bill_date DESC
SELECT * FROM billers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM billers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE paid = false ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT amount, due_date FROM bills WHERE amount > 1000 AND due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email, address FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM billers LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM billers WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT u.username, b.amount, b.due_date FROM users u JOIN bills b ON u.user_id = b.biller_id;
SELECT b.bill_id, ph.payment_date, ph.amount_paid, ph.status FROM bills b JOIN payment_history ph ON b.bill_id = ph.bill_id;
SELECT r.reminder_id, r.reminder_date, r.reminder_message, b.amount FROM reminders r JOIN bills b ON r.bill_id = b.bill_id WHERE b.amount > 1000;
